item.title: Exploring the diverse world of anime: A guide to anime genres and sub-genres
item.description: Understanding the different genres of anime is important for both fans and beginners as it helps to navigate the vast array of options available and helps you discover shows that match your personal tastes and interests
item.itunes:title: Exploring the diverse world of anime: A guide to anime genres and sub-genres

content:encoded.p: Understanding the different genres of anime is important for both fans and beginners as it helps to navigate the vast array of options available and helps you discover shows that match your personal tastes and interests

item.title: Understanding Japanese Entertainment: The Difference between Anime and Manga
item.description: It is a common misconception that manga and anime are interchangeable terms, with manga being defined as Japanese comics and anime being the animated version of those comics
item.itunes:title: Understanding Japanese Entertainment: The Difference between Anime and Manga

content:encoded.p: It is a common misconception that manga and anime are interchangeable terms, with manga being defined as Japanese comics and anime being the animated version of those comics

item.title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu climbs 600 steps barefoot to seek blessing at Pazhani temple, lights camphor on her way
item.description: Samantha Ruth Prabhu recently visited the Pazhani temple, ahead of Shaakuntalam release. She sought blessings and clicked photos with some fans.
item.itunes:title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu climbs 600 steps barefoot to seek blessing at Pazhani temple, lights camphor on her way

content:encoded.p: Samantha Ruth Prabhu recently visited the Pazhani temple, ahead of Shaakuntalam release. She sought blessings and clicked photos with some fans.

item.title: A beginner's guide to watching anime: Tips and recommendations
item.description: Originating from Japan, it has become a global phenomenon and captured the hearts of millions of fans all over the world. Do you want to watch anime but don't know where to start? If yes, then this beginner's guide to help you get started
item.itunes:title: A beginner's guide to watching anime: Tips and recommendations

item.title: The top 10 must-see classic anime series of all time
item.description: From being watched and rewatched by fans to influencing numerous contemporary anime, these classic anime series have become synonymous with the best of the genre, making them to anime what "Hamlet" is to the theatre, "Pride and Prejudice" is to literature, and "Mona Lisa" is to art
item.itunes:title: The top 10 must-see classic anime series of all time

content:encoded.p: From being watched and rewatched by fans to influencing numerous contemporary anime, these classic anime series have become synonymous with the best of the genre, making them to anime what "Hamlet" is to the theatre, "Pride and Prejudice" is to literature, and "Mona Lisa" is to art

item.title: Janhvi Kapoor to make Telugu debut opposite Jr NTR in NTR 30, project to roll in March
item.description: Janhvi Kapoor is all set to make her Telugu debut alongside actor Jr NTR, as per sources. She is expected to join the film's team for a photoshoot soon.

item.title: Ram Charan makes grand entry amid cheering fans as he lands on RC 15 set from chopper in leaked video. Watch
item.description: In a leaked video from the shoot, a chopper is seen landing as cheering fans try to catch a glimpse of Ram Charan he steps down from the aircraft.

item.title: Mahesh Babu’s son reacts as he’s chased by paparazzi while attending India’s first Formula E race in Hyderabad
item.description: Mahesh Babu’s son Gautam Ghattamaneni was chased by media for his reaction as he attended India’s first Formula E race in Hyderabad on Saturday.
